Title: Monster Family
Writer: David Safier (screenplay), Catharina Junk (screenplay), David Safier (book), Benedikt Niemann (additional writing), Kirstie Falkous (additional writing), Jens Benecke (additional writing), Matthias Parchettka (additional writing)
Actors: Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs, Nick Frost, Jessica Brown Findlay
Plot: Despite the title, the Wishbone family are far from happy. In an attempt to reconnect as a family, Mum and Emma plan a fun night out. However, her plan backfires when an evil witch curses them, and they're all turned into Monsters.
